name: Hyper Hall
description:
Created by Olin Gallet | @olingallet

What is Hyper Hall?

Hyper Hall is an arcade twitch endless runner designed for Ludum Dare 34. The intent was to create an arcade game using 2 buttons.

The name comes from the Battletoads game for the NES; the Turbo Tunnel level inspired this game.

How do you play?

Press space to start the game. Afterwards, move your bike past the blue barriers. You can only move up and down with the up and down arrow keys respectively. Hit a barrier and it's game over.

Afterthoughts on the Project

My main goal was to see how fast I could take a game from idea to prototype using some library code. My thoughts on this are in the gitHub repository.

Otherwise, I'm happy with how the game turned out. My only gripe is that I couldn't get a sound to repeat to mimic the revving of the engine since it would stop playing after some time.
